categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Scout Two" was a human male who served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic in their Starfighter Corps during the Galactic Civil War. While on patrol, Scout Two and his fellow pilot, Scout Three were exploring Scarif when they discovered that the Galactic Empire was building a massive space station.
Scout Two is voiced by Sam Witwer, an actor who has voiced many characters in the Star Wars universe.
